metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8032 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Apache Axis 1.x up to and including 1.4 is vulnerable to a cross-sitescripting (XSS) attack in the default servlet/services.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8032` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libaxis-java - 1.4-28
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: axis package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4-28').
